item.title: Missing fence, 3rd December
item.description:
There is a missing fence separating the park and the garden of ?83 Murray Avenue. My dog ran into the garden and fell into their pond which appeared quite deep. Luckily my dog is okay but it could have been a different outcome. There is nothing to stop children or vulnerable adults wandering in to the garden.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Avenue, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abondened car opposite park gardens in valley road, 3rd December
item.description:
Resident reporting there is a black saloon car which is damaged and debris in the road in the front of the car. There is a garage repair shop nearby and maybe the vehicle will be taken into the repair shop however all the while it is there no one has returned to the vehicle. Resident is reporting that it is left unsafe. Please could someone look into this asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valley Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside no 7, opposite waitrose car park, 3rd December
item.description:
A paving slab near the wall has sunk considerably (a couple of inches at least) which has created a serious trip hazard. Please note: I don't know whether this was caused by a utility company or not. It would be useful to have a 'don't know' option on that question.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9-13, Broadhurst Gardens, South Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian crossing signal pole vandalised, 3rd December
item.description:
The stickers and graffiti create visual clutter and are a form of public property defacement. The large orange overlay on the signal box may also partially obscure or interfere with the visibility of the unit itself. Please remove them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockholm Road, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Vehicle with Gated Carpark, 3rd December
item.description:
A silver Vauxhall Corsa (reg: GJ06 WYU) that has been parked in the gated area for over six months and appears unused. Its tyres are flat and there is visible rubbish inside the vehicle.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Listria Park, Hackney, London

item.title: Tree roots growing under pavement and pushed slabs out., 3rd December
item.description:
Please see the images I have attached, the cause of the problem by the steps is the roots from the tree coming up, this is on the council side of the pavement and would be the councils responsibility, the area that is impacted is on Alaska's Building part which we cannot make good of the surface without the trees dug out by council and the slabs replayed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 161, Grange Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
